mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, password, name, email, phone, auth) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{auth});
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET password = #{password}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone} WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO delivery (member_id, shipping_address_name, receiver, phone, address) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{shipping_address_name},#{receiver}, #{phone}, #{address})
